performance.performance_analysis: Debater 1 presented a balanced view on generative AI, highlighting both positive and negative aspects. Their arguments were logical, but lacked depth in examples. They engaged well with others, showing adaptability in discussions. However, their clarity and coherence could be improved for a more structured delivery.

Debater 2 demonstrated strong argumentation skills, effectively using examples to support their points. They were persuasive and engaged actively with other debaters, showing a good understanding of the topic. Their responses were coherent and well-prepared, though they could enhance clarity in some areas.

Debater 3 provided insightful perspectives on the impact of generative AI, with a focus on human creativity. They engaged well with others and presented logical arguments. However, their organization and clarity could be improved to enhance the overall coherence of their points.

Debater 4 raised important ethical considerations regarding data usage in AI. They engaged with the discussion but lacked clarity and organization in their delivery. Their arguments were valid but could benefit from more structured examples and a clearer presentation.
